meanings.sent1: She mispositioned the vase on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: He always mispositions his keys and then can't find them.
meanings.sent3: The robot mispositioned the cups, causing a funny chain reaction.
meanings.sent4: Her mispositioning of the chairs turned the room into a maze.
meanings.sent5: The chef's mispositioning of ingredients led to a disastrous dish.

meanings.definition: The act of positioning something incorrectly.
meanings.sent1: The mispositioning of the sign confused many drivers.
meanings.sent2: Mispositioning can lead to accidents on the assembly line.
meanings.sent3: The mispositioning of the painting made it look like modern art.
meanings.sent4: In the dance routine, the mispositioning of one dancer threw off the whole group.
meanings.sent5: The mispositioning of the spotlight created a dramatic effect on stage.
